description.brief: Classes to facilitate timestamping of sensor data.

package.description:
timestamp_tools provides:
a PeriodicTimestampMinFilter, which takes a stream of timestamps with a known period that may occasionally have been arbitrarily delayed, and outputs a stream of timestamps in which the arbitrary delays have been filtered out using a min filter.
a TriggerMatcher, that matches a stream of data structures with approximate timestamps to a stream of exact timestamps.
package.author: Blaise Gassend
